name: Oue Caught In Rhythm Africa
description:
Play as Maliaka, one of the chosen Subjects of the Yoruba Goddess of Fertility and Music (among many others) Oshun as you seek to claim the divine fruits that will revitalize a dying world through rhythm and Courage. 

What challenges will Maliaka encounter, will she succeed with the help of her friends, is the world destined to despair, or is there a glimmer of hope for a new future, find out in the lands of the Marked Servants, Oue, Caught In Rhythm Africa
